title: CUPSHE Women's Floral Mini Fall Dress Ditsy Surplice V Neck Long Peasant Sleeve Elastic Waist Casual Spring Dresses
description: [Premium Fabric]: The floral fall dress is made of 100% Polyester, so that it is breathable and cozy with slightly elasticity.

[Unique Design]: Channel some fiercely feminine vibes with this mini dress featuring a ditsy floral print, surplice neckline, elasticized waistband, long peasant sleeves, and an A-line silhouette. Complete the look with faux leather booties and fedora hat.
[Perfect Sizing]: Available in XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL. ( XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16-18, XXL=20-22). Please refer to our size chart for specific measurements to achieve the perfect fit.

Occasion: This a line dress is Perfect for Wedding Guest Outfits, Graduation, Wedding, Beach Vacation, Cocktail Party, Tea Party, Club etc. It Can Also Be Worn In Spring Summer Autumn with a Jacket or Coat for Daily Wear.
Model Wearing Size: S. ( Height: 5' 8'' in / 177 cm, Bust: 35.4 in / 90 cm, Waist: 25 in / 63 cm Hips: 36.61 in / 93 cm)
